xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Namespace for network inventory resources.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Namespace for objects managed by ASDC

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Collection of subgraph definitions provided by ASDC to describe the inventory assets and their connections related to ASDC models

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Subgraph definition provided by ASDC to describe an inventory asset and its connections related to ASDC models, independent of version

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Unique identifier corresponding to the main definition of a model in ASDC

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Type of the model, e.g., service, resource, widget, etc.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used for optimistic concurrency. Must be empty on create, valid on update and delete.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Subgraph definition provided by ASDC to describe a specific version of an inventory asset and its connections related to ASDC models

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Unique identifier corresponding to one version of a model in ASDC

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Name of the model, which can change from version to version.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used for optimistic concurrency. Must be empty on create, valid on update and delete.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Collection of VNFs

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Unique id of VNF. This is unique across the graph.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Name of VNF.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Alternate name of VNF.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: String capturing type of vnf, that was intended to identify the ASDC resource. This field has been overloaded in service-specific ways and clients should expect changes to occur in the future to this field as ECOMP matures.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Unique identifier of service, does not necessarily map to ASDC service models. SOON TO BE DEPRECATED

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Regional way of organizing pservers, source of truth should define values

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Trigger for operational monitoring of this resource by Service Assurance systems.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Indicator for whether the resource is considered operational. Valid values are in-service-path and out-of-service-path.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: OBSOLETE - do not use

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Client should send valid enumerated value

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Orchestration status of this VNF, used by MSO.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Heat stack id corresponding to this instance, managed by MSO

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Corresponds to the SDN-C catalog id used to configure this VCE

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: identifier of managed by company or customer

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Address tail-f uses to configure test-object, also used for troubleshooting and is IP used for traps generated by test-object.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: v4 Loopback0 address

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: v6 Loopback address

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: v6 management address

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: number of vcpus ordered for this instance of VNF, used for VNFs with no vservers/flavors, to be used only in some usecases

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: units associated with vcpu, used for VNFs with no vservers/flavors, to be used only in some usecases

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: number of GB of memory ordered for this instance of VNF, used for VNFs with no vservers/flavors, to be used only in some usecases

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: units associated with vmemory, used for VNFs with no vservers/flavors, to be used only in some usecases

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: number of vdisks ordered for this instance of VNF, used for VNFs with no vservers/flavors, to be used only in some usecases

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: units associated with vdisk, used for VNFs with no vservers/flavors, to be used only in some usecases

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: used to indicate whether or not this object is in maintenance mode (maintenance mode = true). This field (in conjunction with prov-status) is used to suppress alarms and vSCL on VNFs/VMs.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: used to indicate whether closed loop function is enabled on this node

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used for optimistic concurrency. Must be empty on create, valid on update and delete.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: details regarding the test-object operation, PLEASE DISCONTINUE USE OF THIS FIELD.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: indicates whether access uses SSH

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: UUID of the Entitlement group used for licensing VNFs, OBSOLETE - See child relationships.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: UUID of the specific entitlement resource. OBSOLETE - See child relationships.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: UUID of the license assignment group. OBSOLETE - See child relationships.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: UUID of the actual license resource. OBSOLETE - See child relationships.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: the ASDC model id for this resource or service model.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: the ASDC model version for this resource or service model.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: the ASDC model version for this resource or service model.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: captures the id of all the configuration used to customize the resource for the service.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: the ASDC data dictionary widget model. This maps directly to the A&AI widget.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: the ASDC data dictionary version of the widget model.This maps directly to the A&AI version of the widget.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: as-number of the VNF

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: represents sub zone of the rr plane

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Path to the controller object.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: General purpose VNF

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Unique ID of the interface

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Neutron network id of this Interface

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Neutron network name of this Interface

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Role assigned to this Interface, should use values as defined in ECOMP Yang models.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used for optimistic concurrency. Must be empty on create, valid on update and delete.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Unique ID for port group in vmware

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Likely to duplicate value of neutron network name

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: DVS or standard switch name (should be non-null for port groups associated with DVS)

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Orchestration status of this VNF, mastered by MSO

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Heat stack id corresponding to this instance, managed by MSO

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Corresponds to the SDN-C catalog id used to configure this VCE

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used to capture the network interfaces of this VCE

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: A keyword provided by A&AI to indicate type of node.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: URL to the object in A&AI.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Key part of a key/value pair

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Value part of a key/value pair

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: A keyword provided by A&AI to indicate an attribute.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Value of the attribute.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: A keyword provided by A&AI to indicate an attribute.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Value of the attribute.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: VPN ID, globally unique within A&AI

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: VPN Name

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Number used to identify a VPN, globally unique in the network

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: the platform associated with the VPN example AVPN, Mobility

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Type of the vpn, should be taken from enumerated/valid values

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used to distinguish the distinct VPN routes of separate customers who connect to the provider in an MPLS network.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Role assigned to this route target

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: Used for optimistic concurrency. Must be empty on create, valid on update and delete.

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: l3-networks relate to vpn-bindings

xml-property.name: description
xml-property.value: VPN binding
